alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 7:41PM CDT until April 19 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western and Central Taylor County in west central Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm in western Taylor County was located over Camp Butman, or near Coronados Camp, and moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Coronados Camp around 745 PM CDT. View around 800 PM CDT. Dyess Afb and Caps around 805 PM CDT. Wylie and Tye around 810 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lake Abilene, Camp Tonkawa and Camp Butman. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 270 and 278. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
